section.title: medium of performance of musical content
section.p: MARC recommendations from the MLA Encoding Standards Subcommittee's MARC Cataloging Inefficiency Task Group:

ul.li: For new bibliographic records, prefer recording medium of performance in field 382 over field 048. In existing records, generally do not update field 048 unless directed by local policy.

section.p: This recommendation is reflected in the MLA Best Practices in the RDA Toolkit.
